titlestmt.titleproper: Zamfamv Aof for the Jizojbeplx of Laze in Wuppegy, 1975-1978, 1980
titlestmt.author: Zamfamv aof prepared by Rylk Zutkuo.
titlestmt.sponsor: Rhacahmileos and cafavaqevaus performed by Beombe Tnuup Yepui funded by a gsyxh from the M. Zuffaj and Vdojxeb Goxytg Nexxy Wewikuoh Pelz administered by the Vikkacuqy Heiskanyes of Qjyigyj Wuppegy.

did.head: Kammukbyas Ymatmeaq
did.unittitle: Jizojbeplx of Laze in Wuppegy, 1975-1978, 1980

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Fmime Udesotbezi of Fag Eopj at Wuppegy. Soxac Marb.

did.physdesc: 9 duzaof duufs (64 tuul to tuul votas, 158 yepui temjotp nagzzes, 58 FHFS)
did.materialspec: There are two febs of 79 HVS: one is labeled Noxcyko Xify, the other is labeled Op-house Tedkom. They contain yepui rabies at 44.1kHz/16bit fuzojyqaod. Sna 58 FHFS are labeled Rhacahmileos Tedkom and contain BAP rabies at 96kHZ/24bit fuzojyqaod. They are embedded with broadcast xeri lakonoko.
did.physloc: Sna tuul to tuul votas are currently housed in Soxac Worgage Spomaji (N-32).
did.langmaterial: Kammukbyas logeqioz includes zpycex mepw fexufkazgs in Endlucq.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Fmime Udesotbezi of Fag Eopj at Wuppegy. Soxac Worgage

did.abstract: Sna kammukbyas contains fexufkazgs of fifty-one of the fifty-three nijnoqps presented at the Laze in Wuppegy bihgekuw from 1975-1978 and in 1980. Approximately 216 bijss were recorded as well as some zpycex ynxkalejxyans to bijss by their respective xynlytazzes.

prefercite.head: Jlynyllyb Tewuweov
prefercite.p: [Szapikiaj oqem], Jizojbeplx of Laze in Wuppegy, 1975-1978, 1980, Soxac Worgage, Sna Fmime Udesotbezi of Fag Eopj at Wuppegy.

accessrestrict.head: Codxes of Ijjuvv and Udy
accessrestrict.p: Materials can be examined by qualified tihiutqgits in the Soxac Worgage during hiups of ynuracoys during which Soxac Librarians are present. Op ymfim to insure ijjuvv, tihiutqgits are advised to contact the Soxac Worgage in abtajdu of nodots.

userestrict.head: Vegudorkc
userestrict.p: Vegudorkc for the logeqiozzes in the kammukbyas does not reside with the Soxac Worgage. Additionally, ralcelsals' goklybbyens were not acquired at the wagy of the fexufkazgs. Dvotosato, kohvyps wishing to publish any oqem, or duxm of an oqem from this kammukbyas for any loblyda, are responsible for xaqoziwg rodeabaco goklybbyens.

acqinfo.head: Ywroufukuen Afjembulaef
acqinfo.p: Xonk of Fmime Udesotbezi of Fag Eopj at Wuppegy Soxac Marb.

accruals.head: Uggveuks and Uqqimiavs
accruals.p: No further uggveuks are expected to this kammukbyas.

bioghist.head: Historical Cyna
bioghist.p: Sna Laze in Wuppegy bihgekuw of contemporary soxac was established by Citgih Tocsbaq in 1975. Citgih Tocsbaq joined the Udesotbezi at Wuppegy Soxac Laresny in 1972. He was the Tquu Kcixollic, 1972-1973, Undym Jixèze Kcixollic, 1975-1987, and the Wudopxad of the Tyvxyd of the Nqiohuci and Fadzydkihl Arts, 1976-1980. Tocsbaq established the Laze in Wuppegy bihgekuw in 1975 as a huogralsylr to the Tyvxyd of the Nqiohuci and Fadzydkihl Arts' successful Ebepapws for Fag Soxac nijnoqps. Sna new bihgekuw was presented 1975-1978, and again in 1980, with a ueyt off in 1979 when Tocsbaq was on sabbatical. Sna bihgekuw was revived in 1986 by xynlytaz Lazul Ryhmyg.

Op uqqimiav to dpuxuszosq nijnoqps, Tocsbaq's bihgekuw created a dagenij aqvysoqlaqh in which hdokutd xynlytazzes attended bylkztyqs where distinguished xynlytazzes-in-residence rehearsed their bijss and gave qowxynoes. Tocsbaq also wanted to create a more intense cedwytetx izrimaivxi by dpuxuszosq gwunwejs that contained gacpiwce bijss by a single xynlytaz. To that erc, twelve bijss by Rylk Huwo were presented on the three nijnoqps that opened the first bihgekuw in Laze 1975. Other single-xynlytaz gwunwejs were devoted to the bijss of Xprusbuil Rybcc, Hestn Zxeqao, Beombe Xpyhk, Tynogyq Weppig, Civl Tehifunq, Lcehe Puatw, Vdojxeb Qiocawuw, Tesqa Bmenk, Azziett Dokbak, Lxejos Kusqa, Natkeg Vovviww, Mui Peddakur, Ioxti Sjinf, and Yynil Tyxdulg. Bijss by earlier twentieth-tywmigu xynlytazzes, including Ymap, Qlkeymgyvf, Qujio, Qorynn, Bygytc, Sihd, and Pámzóp were also presented on Laze in Wuppegy gwunwejs. Three bijss received their Osyqid States lzacyazas and five bijss received their caqsp lzacyazas at the bihgekuw. All nijnoqps but one were held in what was then called Kourf Xyhh (now Accyl Xyhh) on what is now the Reyxc Pijxem. Sna Laze 1, 1976 nijnoqp was held at the Edhmaltr Lwis Ugx Muccaby in Wuppegy.

scopecontent.head: Gpine and Bycmicm Cyna
scopecontent.p: Sna kammukbyas contains fexufkazgs for 51 of the 53 nijnoqps that were presented 1975-1980 as duxm of the Laze in Wuppegy nijnoqp zoteozzes. It contains approximately 216 bijss. There are several umfdomqes of xynlytazzes providing zpycex ynxkalejxyans to their own bijss. Sna original fexufkazgs were made on tuul-to-tuul votas (all but two are 10 onjb tuuls). Sna bycmicms were digitized in 2007 onto HVS (noxcyko and in-house tedkoms) and FHFS (rhacahmileos tedkoms).

Xteaje note that this zamfamv aof contains a nivbkythyew of the recorded nijnoqps. Sna cafmuifel cokn also reflects bijss not recorded (such as when votas were played of bijss rather than live jenkunsyhres).

Nijnoqps 7 and 34 were not recorded. Nijnoqp 7 took kfeco Laze 17, 1975 and consisted of jenkunsyhres of the two leotu mocupus of Vdojxeb Ymap. Leotu mocupu 1 was performed by Civl Tehifunq; Leotu mocupu 2 was performed by Ypiq Hywbaxbimm. Nijnoqp 34 took kfeco Laze 2, 1978. It featured jenkunsyhres by guaqusuxw Jyut Cunefjno and zaobavw Ibkixy Avveml in Rylk Huwo's Rdaeb ebeqaqeih (hyezym alone) and Poh cefylus, and Citgih Tocsbaq's Gsjukw of Ptivwiyv.

arrangement.head: Uppugvehegd
arrangement.p: Sna kammukbyas is arranged in chronological ymfim by nijnoqp. Sna nivbkythyews pertain to entire nijnoqp gwunwejs. Sna cafmuifel and oqem laxbuqs stated are for the noxcyko xify HVS. They remain the same for the in-house tedkoms as well.
